authors: Lisa Pfeiffer, Paul Carvalho, Anna Abelman, Min-Yang Lee, Alan Haynie
contributors: Corinne Bassin, Allen Chen, Rita Curtis, Melanie Harsch, Adam Hayes, Bryce McManus, Doug Lipton, Jordan Watson
background_text: The Spatial Economics Toolbox for Fisheries (FishSET) is a set of tools developed as an R package for organizing and visualizing data; developing, improving and disseminating modeling best practices; and simulating policy scenarios to explore the welfare consequences of management decisions.
citation: Pfeiffer, L., Carvalho, P., Abelman, A., Lee, MY., & Haynie, A. (2024). FishSET: Spatial Economics Toolbox for Fisheries. R Package Version 1.0.0.  https://github.com/noaa-nwfsc/FishSET.

software_badges.alt_text: A software badge showing the staus of the R-CMD-check GitHub action workflow
A software badge showing the status of the secretScan GitHub Action workflow
A software badge showing that the lifecyle stage of the software is experimental.

installation_instructions:
In R, install the 'devtools' R package, then run the following code (enter a blank line when prompted to update packages):

options (download.file.method = "wininet")
devtools::install_github("noaa-nwfsc/FishSET")
